products.name: Harmony Dining Table
products.description: A stunning dining table with a live edge walnut top and sculptural base. This piece combines natural beauty with artistic design for a truly unique dining experience.

products.name: Cascade Coffee Table
products.description: Inspired by flowing water, this coffee table features a glass top that appears to float above a sculptural wooden base with teal accents. A conversation piece that brings artistic flair to any living room.

products.name: Eclipse Side Table
products.description: A versatile side table with overlapping circular forms that create a play of light and shadow. Perfect as a bedside table or accent piece in any room.

products.name: Horizon Console Table
products.description: A sleek console table with a minimalist design that emphasizes clean lines and negative space. The perfect addition to an entryway or behind a sofa.

products.name: Mosaic Dining Table
products.description: A round dining table featuring an intricate mosaic pattern of reclaimed woods. Each piece is unique, creating a one-of-a-kind table that tells a story of sustainability and craftsmanship.

products.name: Prism Coffee Table
products.description: A geometric coffee table with faceted sides that reflect light in captivating ways. The glass top provides a clear view of the artistic base below.

products.name: Nest Side Tables (Set of 3)
products.description: A set of three nesting side tables with varying heights and complementary designs. Use them together or separately for flexible, artistic functionality.

products.name: Ribbon Console Table
products.description: A console table with a base that appears to flow like a ribbon, creating a sense of movement and grace. The marble top adds a touch of luxury to this artistic piece.

products.name: Canopy Dining Table
products.description: Inspired by forest canopies, this dining table features an intricate base that mimics the branching patterns of trees. The solid wood top provides a sturdy surface for memorable gatherings.

products.name: Ripple Coffee Table
products.description: A coffee table with a surface that mimics the gentle ripples of water. The organic form creates a sense of calm and natural beauty in your living space.

products.name: Pedestal Side Table
products.description: A sculptural side table that doubles as a pedestal for displaying art objects. The interplay of materials creates visual interest and versatility.

products.name: Mirage Console Table
products.description: A console table with a reflective surface that creates the illusion of depth and space. The minimalist design allows it to complement any interior style.

categories.name: Dining Tables
categories.description: Artistic dining tables that serve as the centerpiece for memorable gatherings.

categories.name: Coffee Tables
categories.description: Sculptural coffee tables that blend art and functionality in your living space.

categories.name: Side Tables
categories.description: Versatile side tables that add artistic flair to any room.

categories.description: Elegant console tables that transform entryways and living spaces.

categories.name: Custom Designs

categories.name: Limited Editions
